column5: My brother can write, he's taking all his notes from the journal he keeps while on our fly-in trips, and converting them into short stories with pictures  this is just the early years, and he'll be adding more as he gets time  there's no exaggeration, everything is true, some stuff has been left out for various reasons though (hahaha)     http://www.chroniclesoffish.blogspot.ca/
This was a great read.....looking forward to read more of these adventures
just got through the first report and it's great! But he needs more pictures
just got through the first report and it's great! But he needs more pictures I think they kept forgetting to take the camera and some French dude is holding a pic hostage
